vista.graph
Class LineElement

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.LineElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, Drawable, ScaledElement
public class LineElement
extends GraphicElement
implements ScaledElement

This controls the drawing of a line within the bounds of the given rectangle.

Currently this class only draws horizontal and vertical lines clipped within the drawing region. Furthermore each line is drawn from a starting point to the end of the drawing Area dimensions.

Version:
$Id: LineElement.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:05 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu

constructor. In addition to construction parameters of its parent class it has color, thickess and style as its parameters

drawThickLine

public final void drawThickLine(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                int x1,
                                int y1,
                                int x2,
                                int y2,
                                double t)
Simulates drawing of different thickness lines by using filled polygon.

Parameters:
g - Graphics on which to draw
x1 - The starting x co-ordinate of line
y1 - The starting y co-ordinate of line
x2 - The ending x co-ordinate of line
y2 - The ending y co-ordinate of line
t - The thickness of the line in pixels
